Name: id
Description: Belvo's unique identifier for the current item.

Name: collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: created_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of when the data point was created in Belvo's database.

Name: internal_identification
Description: The institutionâ€™s internal identification number for the document.

Name: pdf
Description: Tax compliance status PDF as a binary.

Name: rfc
Description: The account holder's RFC (Registro Federal de Contribuyentes) number.

Name: outcome
Description:
Indicates whether the taxpayer is complying to all their tax obligations
(`POSITIVE`), if they are not (`NEGATIVE`), or have none to comply to
(`NO_OBLIGATIONS`).
